benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/customFields - Retrieve bundle custom fields

covered: Valid Request: Multiple success scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03) validate normal responses and schema for audit variants (NONE/FULL/MINIMAL).
Empty Response: TC04 verifies behavior when a bundle has no custom fields (empty JSON array).
Query Parameters: Good coverage of audit parameter (valid values FULL/MINIMAL/default and invalid values via TC07/TC13) and handling of unexpected query params (TC10).
Error Responses: Story-required errors are covered: 400 for invalid bundleId format (TC06) and 404 for bundle not found (TC05).
Resilience/Integration: TC09 and TC16 cover downstream service/database unavailability (503).
Performance/Load: TC14 and TC19 cover long-running operations and concurrent requests.
Response Metadata/Format: TC20 verifies Content-Type and that the body is valid JSON.
Edge case sizing: TC11 and TC12 cover max/min numbers of custom fields.
gaps: Pagination: No test covers pagination or how large result sets are paged (e.g., limit/offset or page tokens).
Rate Limiting / Throttling: No tests for API rate limits or behavior when request quotas are exceeded (429).
Caching / Conditional Requests: No tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) or conditional GET behavior (If-None-Match / 304 responses).
Authorization nuance (403): Tests cover unauthenticated (401) but not authorized-but-forbidden scenarios (valid token but insufficient permissions -> 403).
Content negotiation / Accept header: No tests for Accept header variations or behavior when client requests unsupported media types (e.g., 406).
recommendations: Add pagination tests: verify behavior when results exceed a single response (limit, offset/page, next links), and test correctness & stability across pages.
Add rate-limiting tests: simulate bursts to validate 429 responses and Retry-After header handling and ensure graceful degradation.
Add caching and conditional GET tests: verify ETag/Cache-Control presence, and If-None-Match handling resulting in 304 when appropriate.
Add authorization-permission tests (403): verify behavior for authenticated users lacking required permissions or roles.
Add content-negotiation tests: vary Accept headers (application/json, */*, unsupported types) and verify proper status codes and fallback behavior.
Consider tests for header validation and size/length limits on path params (very long bundleId) and tests asserting consistent error payload schemas across error responses.
